Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: Looking for alpha-testers for nSPV + HUSH, and will pay bounties for testing/etc. I figure most people interested are in this room. Later today I will post details of public HUSH nSPV servers that can be used. I would also be interested in HUSH spearheading the writing of more tests + docs for nSPV, and HUSH can provide bounties in additional to any other projects that might want to
